title: Most commonly reported types of cyber crime 2018
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Cyber Incidents, and Number of complaints in each Cyber Incidents on the y axis.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The lowest value at Cyber Incidents Spoofing is 4.18x times less than the highest value at Non-payment/Non-delivery.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cyber Incidents in the x axis and Number of complaints in the y axis.
The Number of complaints is highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Cyber Incidents, and Number of complaints in each Cyber Incidents on the y axis.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The lowest value at Cyber Incidents Spoofing is 4.18x times less than the highest value at Non-payment/Non-delivery.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of complaints for 11 number of Cyber Incidentss.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The second highest Number of complaints is appeared to be the Cyber Incidents Extortion.
There is a difference of 49547.0 between the maximum Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and minimum Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery has the highest Number of complaints, followed by Extortion, and Personal data breach. Down to the Cyber Incidents Spoofing which is the lowest.
The Cyber Incidents Spoofing has 2.13 times less Number of complaints than average.
Summing up the values of all Cyber Incidentss, we get total 335559.0.
